title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: America once had enough silver to meet its needs. But that’s been outsourced too.
items.description: Charlie Garcia responds to readers’ concerns about China’s control of silver and other critical metals used in technology and defense.

items.title: This could be a better — and safer — way into the AI trade in 2026
items.description: Investors might be well served to look beyond semiconductor makers to take part in the AI boom — and more toward the companies that make manufacturing...

items.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
items.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

items.title: Investors pin hopes on the ‘January barometer,’ with stocks set to skip ‘Santa Claus rally’ for a 3rd year
items.description: For the third straight year, the S&P 500 looks poised to fall during the “Santa Claus rally” period. That has never happened before.

items.title: This one unavoidable tax can sink your retirement plan
items.description: How to trim your tax bill when taking RMDs.

items.title: These are the most overbought and oversold stocks in the S&P 500 as 2026 begins
items.description: The year just began, but there may be opportunities for investors to catch potential bounces on some stocks — or avoid pullbacks near-term.

items.title: Bank of America expects a boost in dividends in 2026. These stocks have payouts that beat the market
items.description: Bank of America's Savita Subramanian expects stocks’ dividend growth will rise year over year in 2026.

items.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip as Warren Buffett exits and Greg Abel era begins
items.description: Investors digested the formal end of Warren Buffett's six-decade tenure as chief executive and the start of a new era under successor Greg Abel.

items.title: Bank of America is betting on these stocks, including one Big Tech laggard, in the first quarter of 2026
